hypothesis: Fixed-timestep misses (skipped periodic maintenance) correlate with repair burden in subsequent sessions, analogous to game-loop frame-drops causing state-coherence debt
interpretation: Post-periodic sessions show lower L+P (0.51 vs 1.10, delta=-0.60). Repair sessions (frame-drop proxies) show lower L+P (0.66 vs 0.91), suggesting repair work consumes session budget.

game_loop_parallel.frame_drop: periodic skipped or overdue = state-coherence debt
game_loop_parallel.stutter: repair sessions consuming budget on overhead vs L+P production

next_step: F-GAME3: measure frontier resolution latency distribution to identify flow zone vs boredom/anxiety zones
